meanings.definition: A shop that sells herbs, charms, and other items associated with magic and spirituality.
meanings.sent1: I visited the botanica to buy some herbs for my tea.
meanings.sent2: The botanica on the corner always has interesting items in the window display.
meanings.sent3: At the botanica, I found a charm that was supposed to bring good luck - fingers crossed!
meanings.sent4: The botanica felt like a treasure trove of mystical objects waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The scent of incense filled the botanica, creating a magical atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Relating to plants or plant life.
meanings.sent1: The botanica garden was filled with colorful flowers and lush greenery.
meanings.sent2: She studied botanica science to learn more about different types of plants.
meanings.sent3: The botanica exhibit at the fair showcased a variety of exotic plant species.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was adorned with botanica patterns, resembling leaves and flowers.
meanings.sent5: The botanica world in the forest was a peaceful retreat from the bustling city life.
